location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of a Persian letter from the Deputy Secretary to the Government of Bombay to Shaikh of Bushire, ‘Abd al-Rasūl Khān, dated 10 Ṣafar 1238 [30 October 1822]

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: Missing text due to tear damage.

mods.abstract: The letter informs of the appointment of Captain MacLeod. A translation of a letter similar to this one appears on folio 97.
